H

HttpServerStartingExtension - Class in org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi.extension
An AbstractBlockingExtension that searches for any HttpServer instances in the current CDI container and, for each one, starts it.
HttpServerStartingExtension() - Constructor for class org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi.extension.HttpServerStartingExtension
Creates a new HttpServerStartingExtension.

O

org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi.extension - package org.microbean.jersey.container.grizzly2.http.cdi.extension
Provides classes and interfaces for starting a Grizzly HttpServer when a CDI container starts up.
